DEATHKNIGHT_FROST:
Use Power Infusion on the Frost Deathknight when:

  • The Deathknight has the Obliteration talent and Pillar of Frost is active.
  • The Deathknight has the Breath of Sindragosa talent and its channeling effect is active.
  • They do not use Obliteration or Breath of Sindragosa, and Pillar of Frost is active (if talented) or immediately available.
DEATHKNIGHT_UNHOLY:
Use Power Infusion on the Unholy Deathknight when:

  • They’re in a single-target or add-heavy scenario and their Summon Gargoyle is active with ≤22 seconds remaining.
  • They’re using Army of the Dead with Raise Abomination active (≤18s remaining) or Army Ghouls active (≤18s remaining).
  • They have Dark Transformation active and aren’t using Gargoyle/Army of the Dead talents.
  • Their Gargoyle isn’t active and its cooldown won’t align with Power Infusion’s duration.
  • There are ≥3 enemies and either Dark Transformation is active or Death and Decay is ticking.
DEMONHUNTER_HAVOC:
Use Power Infusion on the Havoc Demon Hunter when:

  • They are actively in their Metamorphosis transformation window.
  • The encounter is in its final 20 seconds, regardless of their current cooldowns.
DRUID_BALANCE:
Use Power Infusion on the Balance Druid when:

  • Their Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune is active to amplify their burst damage phase.
  • They are entering a critical Celestial Alignment + Convoke the Spirits combo for maximum burst potential.
  • They are in a high-priority target or execute phase (sub-20% health) to enhance Eclipse and Starfall damage.
  • Their raid group’s damage amplification cooldowns (e.g., Power Infusion timing) align with your own to stack multiplicative buffs.
DRUID_FERAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Feral Druid when:

  • Their major offensive cooldown (e.g., Berserk or Incarnation) is active to amplify burst damage phases.
  • They do not have the Berserk Heart of the Lion talent, as they lack a personal damage steroid and benefit more from external buffs.

HUNTER_SURVIVAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Survival Hunter when:

  • the Survival Hunter has Coordinated Assault active
  • they do not have Coordinated Assault talented and Spearhead is on cooldown
  • they have neither Coordinated Assault nor Spearhead talented
MAGE_FIRE:
Use Power Infusion on the Fire Mage when:

  • Their Combustion is about to come off cooldown and can be aligned with your Power Infusion timing.
  • Their Combustion is active and has more than 7 seconds remaining on its duration.
  • The encounter will end within 20 seconds, requiring a final burst window.
PALADIN_RETRIBUTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Retribution Paladin when:

  • They have Avenging Wrath active, as this increases their damage output during their burst window.
  • They have Crusade active, which significantly amplifies their attack power and haste during critical phases.
  • The target is affected by Execution Sentence, ensuring maximum damage during this high-impact debuff.
PRIEST_SHADOW:
Use Power Infusion on the Shadow Priest when:

  • Voidform is active, Dark Ascension is active, or they have the TWW Season 2 4-piece set bonus, and they don’t already have Power Infusion active.
ROGUE_ASSASSINATION:
Use Power Infusion on the Assassination Rogue when:

  • The Rogue has Deathmark active, as the ability amplifies their damage during this critical window.
ROGUE_SUBTLETY:
Use Power Infusion on the Subtlety Rogue when:

  • Their Shadow Dance buff is active, as this aligns with their burst damage phase and amplifies their most powerful abilities.
SHAMAN_ELEMENTAL:
Use Power Infusion on the Elemental Shaman when:

  • They have Ascendance active to amplify their burst window.
  • Ascendance won’t be available for over 30 seconds, ensuring optimal cooldown alignment.
SHAMAN_ENHANCEMENT:
Use Power Infusion on the Enhancement Shaman when:

  • They have Ascendance, Feral Spirit, or Doom Winds active (prioritize major cooldown windows).
  • The encounter will end within 20 seconds of a 2-minute window (prevows wasted usage before combat ends).
  • Their shortest talented ability cooldown exceeds 120 seconds (prevows misaligned timers).
  • They lack Ascendance, Feral Spirit, and Doom Winds talents (default fallback scenario).
WARLOCK_AFFLICTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Affliction Warlock when:

  • They activate Summon Darkglare and other major cooldowns simultaneously.
  • Their rotation aligns with a burst damage phase, stacking abilities like Darkglare with other short-term buffs.
  • They are executing a pre-planned cooldown window to amplify haste-dependent effects during high-intensity damage periods.
WARLOCK_DEMONOLOGY:
Use Power Infusion on the Demonology Warlock when:

  • Their Demonic Tyrant summon is imminent, with imps about to despawn within two GCDs + Tyrant cast time, and they just cast Hand of Gul'dan or Ruination
  • Or if they're preparing to summon Demonic Tyrant with imps expiring within one GCD + Tyrant cast time or they have fewer than 2 Soul Shards to fuel their rotation
WARLOCK_DESTRUCTION:
Use Power Infusion on the Destruction Warlock when:

  • Their Summon Infernal is active, enhancing its damage during its active window.
  • They are not using the Summon Infernal talent, prioritizing alignment with their alternative major cooldowns.
  • The encounter is nearing its end, allowing a final burst phase before the fight concludes.
WARRIOR_ARMS:
Use Power Infusion on the Arms Warrior when:

  • The target is affected by Colossus Smash and the encounter duration exceeds 135 seconds.
  • They are in the Execute phase (target below 20% health) and have Avatar active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds, regardless of other conditions.
WARRIOR_FURY:
Use Power Infusion on the Fury Warrior when:

  • The Avatar buff has more than 15 seconds remaining and the encounter duration is at least 135 seconds.
  • The Fury Warrior is in the Execute Phase and Avatar is active.
  • The encounter will end within 25 seconds.
